data.name: 小艺的异世界冒险-Xiao Yi's strange world adventure
data.detailed_description:
The great demon king, who has been sealed for a hundred years on the beautiful muenquis continent, is slowly waking up and getting stronger props through plot breakthrough, sneaking, maze and other playing methods

Each time you pass a level, you can obtain a gem. The final light badge will bring you endless power

The task of defeating the demon king depends on you

Let's go! warrior!

"Liu Yi's adventure in a different world" will take you to a wonderful world you will never forget!
data.about_the_game:
The great demon king, who has been sealed for a hundred years on the beautiful muenquis continent, is slowly waking up and getting stronger props through plot breakthrough, sneaking, maze and other playing methods

Each time you pass a level, you can obtain a gem. The final light badge will bring you endless power

The task of defeating the demon king depends on you

Let's go! warrior!

"Liu Yi's adventure in a different world" will take you to a wonderful world you will never forget!
data.short_description: An adventure decryption type of game It mainly triggers the decryption level through the plot mode. In order to save the mainland, you embark on an unknown adventure, look for the mysterious badge of light, and get the power of the great magician!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 5770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 460
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 需要 500MB 可用空间
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960+
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 需要 500MB 可用空间
